night all..sweet dreams to everyone :)
thank goodness I am the only one who can see my replies. I would hate for any of you to have to read it:(
someone replied to one of my posts with vulgarity and rudeness. I feel violated and ill :(

still raining here, yuck :( no orders came in today(still hoping 4 a sale), double yuck :( ran out of peppermint tea...oh pooh :(
and one more quote 4 today - Justine Milton - “Never frown because you never know who might be falling in love with your smile.”
quote: Benjamin Franklin - “A good conscience is a continual Christmas.” LOVE this one!
quote: Meredith Willson - “You pile up enough tomorrows, and you'll find you've collected a lot of empty yesterdays.” wow, very true
waiting for the boys to come home from school, have to do food shopping for Christmas Eve party, menu planned, gifts wrapped, so excited!
